description.english: Are you sure this is the fastest possible way to deal with the tower?
The answer is still far from being found... but now you can walk through that endless path.
Alucard recognized your skill, yet he didn't even sweat...
The tutorial of HH2 ends here, now it's gonna get serious...
You'd hardly call it a victory against the real thing...
So Dracula witnessed something like this, back to that day...
What was he planning to do by doing all this mess?
Elyon still wonders about what's inside that pack...
A gaze which cannot be faced, a pain which cannot be understood... Only the fear is blocking them.
It didn't felt like it was addressed to politicians...
Who's gonna help the helper?
It tasted like... jealousy. It won't feel like a complete ending.
Barely in time... but it just started to move.
It will just stay a possibility, if you won't get past her shadow... at least.
Kinda... seems more like hardware than magic, i guess.
...And this stumpy? It wasn't there before... seize the moment, it's a one time event.
It felt like it was chasing something, but it disappeared.
Let the witch find for you all the locations, when the time will come. This one might be more tricky than actually searching for your own...
It was supposed to be a secret, but actually it will be necessary for your journey.
Here there's a plenty of it...
There's often some of them, in a place in which rituals are performed.
Would you ever attempt to dwell inside a place darker than yourself, while being so unstable? The time will come.
That corpse potentially could have been a lot of you guys, you know.
If that was its size before, then what about now? They never disappear for good.
If you happened to win before the intended moment, then it's time to finish with the main story, what lies below is out of your reach.
Who were the owners of such coffins? Hardly humans i'd say.
Where those locusts will go, anyway? They were supposed to stay here...
Does actually exists a human able to wield this thing? Yet that was the size of the hilt. A blade born for slaying dragons.
Tremendous, but there's something behind way more scary... what is scarier than death?
Beyond the void... beyond reality. If Metaguy didn't stopped it, what could have happened? Don't worry about further challenges related to the White Hand: i don't expect more than winning against it.
...Yet there might be nothing to find... anymore.
The voice didn't come from the metal, still inside there were just the core and the gears...
Not strong as the Vampirebane Sword, yet more balanced and harmless for the wielder.
This one won't be free. The slashes still voice the deads.

Defeat the strongest version of the Beholder without having found the Bat Relic at all. Do you have the guts to meet those requirements and the ones of the "Aberrant Hunter" achievement at the same time?
Stop the ritual before the creatures of the portals might gather more power. What if it could be done even faster than this?
Find the secret treasure of the tower. Exploring and finding hidden tracks are important skills that a hunter must master.
A monstrous scream... what happened while he did faint?
What it was supposed to do with that key? More questions than answers...
Defeat all the four shadows of your past. Strength is not just about a sharp blade.
Hear all the excuses that he could ever imagine to justify his failure... pathetic.
Defeat at least 1 Fallen Apart, instead of losing. Yet it won't change what it really happened...
Defeat at least 1 Shattered Blade, before it can escape. Elyon is quite nimble, Anti-Nomen should had to change approach to smash it properly.
Defeat at least 1 Wristless, before it fades away. Wriggling will just make her chuckle... wait for the proper chance.
Try to get through that Exit, no matter what, before realizing what the true wayout is.
The ultimate failure... surrending. Not a Human, not a Vampire... not a Dhampir: an Abomination.
The proper height to grasp the smell of decomposition...
There's not such thing as a gift: if it can be obtained for free, then it has no value.
It was inevitable: sooner or later this would have been happened, even just to live up the expectation about one of the two main references of HH series.
Improbable place, dark as the abyss... and yet that's the next destination.
Destroy Mirage Skeletons taking no more than 2 attempts: it takes a keen perception, not brute force.
This is starting to look like something that you already seen somewhere...
Are they really so confused, or that's not due to their choice?
A one-way ticket to hell... you'll have to be faster than death.
It awoke due to something that happened recently... a key is involved in something which exist since centuries, or more.
It felt like they were guarding something... who did escape from the mouth of the Fallen Angel?
They are many and different among them...
Unspeakable, like the name of that being... the gate towards another place.
It melts but actually it's not acid...
If only Elyon knew where did he passed through and what it actually happened...
A glimpse of kindness, before the end of the journey... it felt lonely so far, but even Alucard found a comrade in the end.
Get past the first form of Dracula. The strength of the soul can lead beyond.
Congratulation, you won against the Lord of Darkness: The journey of the hunter never ends, this was just a milestone.
Defeat 1 Guardian without the help of Alucard, without having a level higher than 8 and before finding the Soul Eater. Face the mighty blade of the being who earnt the title of "Guardian".
Defeat the Balor without having a level higher than 9 and without being hit more than 3 times from his Firestorm deadly attack. What would happen if that key meets its keyhole?

Defeat the Ancient Red Dragon without having a level higher than 8. Clench your teeth: you'll need all your energy to handle that blast. Ash... ardalon? The name of a dragon who made a pact with a powerful demon.
End the battle by dodge with 1 Horde of Hands, without dodging with Mist Relic, without changing "battle background volume settings" and without using "alert sound on quiet attacks".
Win a battle by attacking against 1 Swirling Souls, 1 Fraudulent Stalagmite and 1 Minced Souls, without changing "battle background volume settings" and without using "alert sound on quiet attacks".
Defeat 1 Thunder Demon without the help of Alucard, without having a level higher than 7 and before finding the Soul Eater.

Survive the duel without having a level higher than 6 and without using more than 3 blood vials, during the battle. Have a taste of the overwhelming strength that countless enemies experienced before meeting their fate... yet it was just a skirmish.

Fight the most important battle that Elyon will ever fight without having a level higher than 5 and before finding the Shadowbane. Elyon chose to living, rather than surviving... but can he bear this burden without shattering?

Defeat the first shadow without having a level higher than 5 and without using more than 5 blood vials, during the battle. A stone connects all what's inside that area... A monument of death gave birth to a vampire hunter.

Defeat the second shadow without having a level higher than 5 and without using more than 3 blood vials, during the battle. A mark which crumbled that empty doll which wandered aimlessly... the death of a vampire hunter.
Defeat the third shadow without having a level higher than 5 and without using more than 8 blood vials, during the battle. A sound that haunted the nights of a lost soul... the birth of a prey.

Defeat the fourth shadow without having a level higher than 5 and without using more than 10 blood vials, during the battle. Strength is about a soul who saw the abyss... but then stood up. The death of a prey... the birth of a Human(oid).
Defeat Bloody Storm without having a level higher than 9 and before finding the Soul Eater. A will bound to a name who doesn't belong to this world... to this reality. Searching for a way to exist...

Defeat the Vampire Alliance without having a level higher than 6 and without using more than 15 blood vials, during the battle. That was not supposed to be won by Elyon, so it is you who surpassed your limits!

Defeat the strongest version of the Beholder without having a level higher than 5, without changing "battle background volume settings" and without using "alert sound on quiet attacks". It will be quite intense...
Defeat Dullahan without having a level higher than 7 and without using more than 15 blood vials, during the battle. How strong actually was the Puppeteer Vampire?

Defeat the Mad Armor Reassembled without having a level higher than 4, before going outside the stronghold and without using more than 12 blood vials, during the battle. This is where the Revenge type of deadly attacks, along with the Barrage type of deadly attacks combine, and can't be ignored.
Complete HH2 at 100%. Missables will get in the way and a huge will is required... search for topics in case of need. Worthy of a True Hunter.

Stop the ritual inside the tower in the fastest possible way, without NEVER loading the game inside the tower. The Beholder will drop the medal if you succeed in the task. Don't underestimate the weakest Beholder.
If you got the same type of achievement in HH1, you might know where this one is. Not even the deepest part of you was able to realize how amazing you actually are!
Finish the quest of Metaguy and receive his reward. Who he really is, anyway?

What if losing might not be the worst thing that can happen? Aside winning, if there's another way to deal with this, who could know more about this irrealistic condition? It will haunt you even outside this save file...

Defeat the minions of the depths of the catacombs without having a level higher than 9. After winning against both, you can backtrack and save: they won't fight again until you win against that thing... at least it won't be more crazy than that.
Defeat all the enemies of the "700 feet below" area without having a level higher than 9, boss included. Was it guarding that door?
Defeat all the enemies of the "600 feet below" area without having a level higher than 8, boss included. Minions must be defeated before finding the Soul Eater.

Reach the Poisonous Swamp without having a level higher than 4, without ever changing "battle background volume settings" and without ever using "alert sound on quiet attacks". You'll need both the secret swords to get past the Succubus... i warned you.
Defeat all the enemies of the "400 feet below" area without having a level higher than 6, and before finding the Soul Eater... boss included.
Defeat 1 Blood Skeleton without having a level higher than 3. You'll better have keen reflexes here...

Finish the main story without having a level higher than 8, without ever changing "battle background volume settings", without ever using "alert sound on quiet attacks" and before finding any of the two secret swords.
Stock in the inventory at least 30 blood vials.
Defeat 1 Statue of the Anathema without having a level higher than 2. Time to learn how HH2 works.
Defeat for good the Lich, the first time you meet him. You won't get exp twice though.

Defeat the Forgotten One (head) without ever dodging with Mist Relic his deadly attack, without changing "battle background volume settings" and without using "alert sound on quiet attacks". It feels a bit like the @CRAZY version.
Defeat the Leader of the Witches while having less than 25% life points. Show some resolve to her.

Defeat the Head of the Secret Services while having less than 25% life points, without changing "battle background volume settings" and without using "alert sound on quiet attacks". Pretty risky indeed.
Defeat the Giant Bat while having less than 25% life points. Don't get mixed up.
Defeat the Puppeteer Vampire while having less than 25% life points. Barely an handicap, compared to his disadvantage...
